MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Derrington Avenue, Hammond Street and surrounding areas. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.59AM on 13th February 2021
